import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[question,setQuestion]=useState('');const[reply,setReply]=useState('');const[imageUrl,setImageUrl]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const speak=text=>{if('speechSynthesis'in window){const utterance=new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(text);utterance.lang='ar-SA';window.speechSynthesis.speak(utterance);}else{console.warn('Speech synthesis not supported.');}};const askChef=async()=>{if(!question.trim())return;// avoid empty questions
setLoading(true);setReply('');setImageUrl('');try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/ask',{question});setReply(response.data.reply);setImageUrl(response.data.imageUrl);speak(response.data.reply);}catch(error){setReply('ÿ≠ÿØÿ´ ÿÆÿ∑ÿ£ÿå ÿ≠ÿßŸàŸÑ ŸÖÿ±ÿ© ÿ´ÿßŸÜŸäÿ©.');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"\uD83D\uDC68\u200D\uD83C\uDF73 \u0645\u0633\u0627\u0639\u062F \u0627\u0644\u0634\u064A\u0641 \u0627\u0644\u0630\u0643\u064A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subtitle",children:"\u0627\u0633\u0623\u0644\u0646\u064A \u0639\u0646 \u0643\u064A\u0641\u064A\u0629 \u062A\u062D\u0636\u064A\u0631 \u0623\u064A \u0637\u0628\u0642 \u0639\u0631\u0628\u064A \u0648\u0633\u0623\u062C\u064A\u0628\u0643 \u062E\u0637\u0648\u0629 \u0628\u062E\u0637\u0648\u0629!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"input-textarea",rows:3,placeholder:"\u0627\u0643\u062A\u0628 \u0633\u0624\u0627\u0644\u0643 \u0645\u062B\u0644\u0627\u064B: \u0643\u064A\u0641 \u0623\u0639\u0645\u0644 \u0645\u0639\u0635\u0648\u0628\u061F",value:question,onChange:e=>setQuestion(e.target.value),disabled:loading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"submit-button",onClick:askChef,disabled:loading,children:loading?'ÿ¨ÿßÿ±Ÿä ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ÿ∂Ÿäÿ±...':'ÿßÿ≥ÿ£ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ¥ŸäŸÅ'}),reply&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"response-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:reply})}),imageUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:"\u0635\u0648\u0631\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0637\u0628\u0642",className:"dish-image"})})]})});}export default App;
